channel.title: Hybrid PVP Bug
channel.description: This seems client sided to me. On all of the items like Full Helms, the black openings do not show up, nor does the logo type thing on the front of the Dragon Platebody. I am thinking something is not letting it show solid black colors?

item.title: Hybrid PVP Bug
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[quote=“staypuff, post:2, topic:396673”][quote author=Mill link=topic=493844.msg3610502#msg3610502 date=1306537649]
This seems client sided to me. On all of the items like Full Helms, the black openings do not show up, nor does the logo type thing on the front of the Dragon Platebody. I am thinking something is not letting it show solid black colors
[/quote]

I have a fix for this, i can add it while i fix your cache. (for full helms, it wont work though, but i can fix some of the other items.)[/quote]
Dude you are my mopar hero. I’m putting u in my sig

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid PVP Bug
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

Mill:

This seems client sided to me. On all of the items like Full Helms, the black openings do not show up, nor does the logo type thing on the front of the Dragon Platebody. I am thinking something is not letting it show solid black colors

I have a fix for this, i can add it while i fix your cache. (for full helms, it wont work though, but i can fix some of the other items.)
